index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Section 23.28 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to recognize roller and ice skating rinks and other similar uses as primarily night time uses for the purpose of determining eligibility for joint use parking, to reflect the change in title of the Superintendent of Buildings to the Director of Construction and Land Use, and to correct typographical errors.
